patterns.react_context_pattern: The app uses React Context for theme management (ThemeContext.tsx). Use similar pattern for i18n provider wrapping in main.tsx
patterns.hooks_pattern: Custom hooks stored in src/hooks/, follow the pattern of importing and using them in page components
patterns.date_formatting_pattern: Current pattern: new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: 'short', day: 'numeric' }). Replace 'en-US' with locale from useLocale hook
patterns.provider_wrapping: Providers are nested in main.tsx: BrowserRouter > ThemeProvider > ToastProvider > App

existing_implementations.description: Found 17 instances of hardcoded 'en-US' locale across 8 frontend files. NO i18next setup exists yet (contrary to spec claim). App uses React Context pattern for theme, which we'll mirror for i18n.
key_insights: ThemeContext uses React.createContext with provider/consumer pattern
main.tsx already has nested provider structure - add I18nextProvider there
MeetingsPage has helper functions formatTime() and formatDate() that encapsulate date formatting - good pattern to preserve
All date formatting uses toLocaleDateString() and toLocaleTimeString() with options objects
